periods.name: This Afternoon
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers between 1pm and 2pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Some of the storms could be severe and produce heavy rain. Mostly sunny. High near 86, with temperatures falling to around 80 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 13 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%.

periods.name: Tonight
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 1am. Some of the storms could be severe and produce heavy rain. Mostly clear. Low around 61, with temperatures rising to around 63 overnight. Southwest wind 8 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%.

periods.name: Saturday
periods.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 80. West wind 7 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

periods.name: Saturday Night
periods.shortForecast: Partly Cloudy then Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms after 1am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 58. North northwest wind 2 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Sunday
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly sunny, with a high near 80. East wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

periods.name: Sunday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 66. Southeast wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%.

periods.name: Monday

periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers after 1pm. Mostly sunny, with a high near 68. Northwest wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.
